gobblin.runtime.cli

Interface CliObjectFactory<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstructorAndPublicMethodsCliObjectFactory, PublicMethodsCliObjectFactory

    public interface CliObjectFactory<T>
    A factory used to create an object from CLI arguments backed by commons-cli library.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CliObjectFactory.HelpArgumentFound
      Thrown if help argument (-h) was found in the app arguments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T buildObject(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cli)
      Build an instance of T from the parsed CommandLine.
      T buildObject(String[] args, int offset, boolean printUsage, String usage)
      Build an instance of T from the input arguments.
      org.apache.commons.cli.Options getOptions() 
      String getUsageString()
      Get a usage string for display on the command line.

    • Method Detail

      • getOptions

        org.apache.commons.cli.Options getOptions()
        Returns:
        an instance of Options understood by this factory.

      • buildObject

        T buildObject(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cli)
        Build an instance of T from the parsed CommandLine. The input CommandLine was parsed with the output of Options, but may include additional Options added by the driver.

      • buildObject

        T buildObject(String[] args,
              int offset,
              boolean printUsage,
              String usage)
       throws IOException
        Build an instance of T from the input arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - input arguments to the application.
        offset - will only start processing from this argument number.
        printUsage - if true, a failure or -h will cause help to be printed and an exception to be thrown.
        usage - usage String to be printed at the beginning of help message.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getUsageString

        String getUsageString()
        Get a usage string for display on the command line. The output of this method will be appended to the base string "gobblin run ". This should specify required options or parameters.
